title: All the Amenities You Deserve with the Lease Rates You’ll Love! 1 BR A
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'HURRY our rent-restricted apartments are going fast!', 'Submit your application paperwork quickly and easily today to reserve your new home.', 'Located in Uptown, Buzza Lofts offers beautiful one and two bedroom homes only minutes from countless dining, shopping, entertainment options.', 'Each home features an open floor-plan, large windows providing amazing natural light, and an in-home washer and dryer.', 'Residents enjoy the stellar amenities including a top-of-the-line fitness center, rooftop terrace, and courtyard veranda with a fire pit and BBQ grills.', 'Gas, water, sewer, and trash removal are included in rent.', 'Contact us today to schedule your tour!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Open Floor Plans To Accommodate The Best Designs That Your Mind Can Create', '- Smoke-Free Building & Apartments - Take It Outside & Away From Common Area Spaces', '- Spectacular Views Of Downtown Minneapolis & All The Best Sights That Uptown Has To Offer', '- Gallery-Style Kitchen Island (Select Homes)', 'With Built-In Microwave', '- Gas, Water, Sewer & Trash Removal Utilities Included', '- Beautiful, 42"-Inch Maple Cabinetry Provides A Clean & Finished Look To A Stainless Kitchen Design', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Buzza Lofts participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,380.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 12:00PM-5:00PM', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Buzza Lofts of Uptown', '1006 West Lake Street', 'Minneapolis, MN, 55408', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'lJ6Jf7oh']
